mods.abstract: RUN-AWAY. FROM the undersigned, on Bayou Courtableau, in this Parish, on the 4th inst., one negro slave, calling himself DICK, about 21 years old, 5 feet 3 inches high. He speaks French and English, and was bought lately at the successional sale of Don Diego A. Larose Fontenot, late of this Parish. A liberal reward will be given to whoever will bring him back to the undersigned, or lodge him in one of the Jails of this State. FELIX GUIBERTEAU. Parish of St. Landry, March 15th, 1856.

recordInfo.recordOrigin: Transformed into MODS from extended Dublin Core by the LDL Development Team at Louisiana State University.
